products.title: Azurite Chenille Teal Blue Curtain
products.metadescription: Azurite chenille teal blue curtain in blue/green. Made to measure from 29.04 with free uk mainland delivery. This curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Their azurite chenille range consists of textured plains with a velour soft-feel finish. This soft green/blue curtain fuses a plush, luxury feel in a wonderful jewelled teal tone to create a on trend room feature that is bound to be noticed. This ocean green shade will provide an exquisite finish within any room or space, particularly when paired with beautiful rich plum shades& dark wooden tones.All their curtains are lovingly handmade within the uk. 
 
We are so proud of the finish and quality, all their curtains come with a free 5-year guarantee for additional peace of mind that you are investing in a something that will stand the test of time. This fabric is also available as a roman blind.
 
 Product id: db-cur1229 fabric colour: teal blue material: 100% polyester lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining   energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes

products.title: Azurite Chenille Indigo Blue Curtain

products.productdescription:
Their azurite chenille range consists of textured plains with a velour soft-feel finish. This bold dark blue curtain fuses a plush, luxury feel in a contemporary blue tone to create a on trend room feature that is bound to be noticed. These rich navy curtains will look beautiful with dark wooden tones and will create a striking look when paired with rich jewel colours. All their curtains are lovingly handmade within the uk. 
 
We are so proud of the finish and quality, all their curtains come with a free 5-year guarantee for additional peace of mind that you are investing in a something that will stand the test of time. This fabric is also available as a roman blind.
